attributes.action: Give more power to public on what Video games are published.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To give us more say on certain videogames that are no good.(There are loads of decent videogames) But there needs to be something done, to stop the ridiculous and games that are all about one thing, no morals from being published.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
